reviews.text:
Awful experience, do not recommend!

We booked a twin room with Booking and it was not clear that the bathroom was shared. It is not a comfortable place overall in summer, in our room was only a sad fan and no mirror. The sheets were for the winter season, sleeping was a difficult task due to the lack of AC. Also the room in front of us was under construction and very early in the morning (9am) we could hear all the noise. Furthermore, the hostal is located in a noisy neighbourhood where drunk people and cars pass by blasting music at full volume during the whole night. The hostal entrance stinks and also there is no laundry room only for the staff so shared areas are sometimes taken up by staff. Lastly, the app system being used to access rooms fails way too many times and makes accessing your room unnecessarily hard. In short:

- Awfully hot
- Noisy
- Bad room access system
- All in all, uncomfortable

I would especially like to thank Magdanéla, the front desk manager. Allways responded quickly and explained everything clearly. My room was as in the pictures and clean. You can definitely choose this place.

The shared fridge is claimed to be protected by writing your name and room number on your items, but other guests do not care if you write your room number or name. It is a welfare community fridge.  And yes rooms are warmer than outside, no fan can make you cool.

I had a good experience staying here for a night. The check-in and check-out process was smooth sailing! You have to download an app and use the app as your key card.
The only downside was that it can get noisy and if you’re a light sleeper, it might be a problem for you!

I cant believe how much of a scam this Is it says the night Is 30 USD and when you pay that they Ask of you to pay almodt double,and of courde the host doesnt want to give you a refund, after all that the room small and not like the pictures and stinks very badly, Aldo se Had a problem with a lightbulb and they didnt "have time" that sad to come and fix it.
Wouldnt recommend to anyone itd better to pay some place better for the same money.
